definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: I love to meet up with my friends, get out of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡和朋友們聚在一起，離開城市的喧囂。

sentences.english: She said to call a week to three days before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 請在您要離開前三至七天左右再打電話過來。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚不僅可以離開水存活，還可以在岸上短間隔移動。

sentences.english: I couldn't wait any longer for you. I had to go.
sentences.chinese: 我等你等得不耐煩了，我已經離開了。

sentences.english: Tessai is shock that Aizen could stop his attack but the three are gone.
sentences.chinese: 鐵齋驚訝藍染能擋下自己的攻擊，三人組離開。

sentences.english: Juve are expected to announce Trezeguet's departure before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 預計在這個月底之前尤文會宣佈特雷澤蓋的離開。

sentences.english: Since I left I have probably changed my view.
sentences.chinese: 當我離開曼聯後，我的看法或許已經改變了。

sentences.english: Wu left Wellington for Auckland by a special plane on the morning of May 27.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國是27日上午乘專機離開惠靈頓抵達奧克蘭的。

sentences.english: He lifted his foot off the accelerator.
The police hustled the tramps out of town .
sentences.chinese: 警察驅逐遊民離開城市。

sentences.english: How do you say good- bye to someone you can't imagine living without?
sentences.chinese: 你要如何和你認爲離開了就無法生存的人說再見？

sentences.english: We left there at 5:00pm, and we were all very happy for this excursion.
sentences.chinese: 我們下午5點離開，我們都在這次郊遊中玩得很高興。

sentences.english: Where has religion taken shelter after Krsna has retired to His own abode?
sentences.chinese: 當奎師那離開回到祂自己的居所後宗教到哪裏去託庇？

sentences.english: Get you love drunk off my hump.
sentences.chinese: 得到你愛醉離開我的駝峯。

sentences.english: After Nikolay's departure, it was more depressing than ever in the Rostovs' house.
sentences.chinese: 尼古拉離開之後，羅斯托夫家中比任何時候更憂鬱了。

definition: (in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
